data.name: SUPER ARMY OF TENTACLES 3, XPACK II: Call of Koithulhu
data.detailed_description:
To save Halloween, they'll have to save it.

This DLC pack contains a spooky new quest, a less spooky second quest, new enemies, new allies, and new outfits for EVERY party member.

The quest will show up at the start of Act 2. This quest is given by Weyland Payne (in Philly).



Deep within the Black Woods, an evil grows. Learn more about how the corrupted Earth Knights.... well, became corrupted. Travel the globe on a quest to stop a rogue group of cultists from summoning a great evil from beyond this dimension. Make the apocalypse less apocalyptic. Make everything all cool again.

Finishing this quest unlocks the Koithulhu skin for Cthulhu, which can be toggled via your ships engine room.



Includes two sets of Halloween outfits for each party member.

- Dork Universe (Available from the start)
- Twitch Con (Available after the main quest is done)

Perry: T-Rex, Twitch Streamer
American Dave/Canadian Dave: Scarecrow, Wolf Man
Cady: Angel, Raccoon Dog
Ein Mozart Nixon: Robot, Bob Ross
Jack: Zombie, Major League Gamer
Kirk: Slasher, Cardboard Box
Morris: Runes, Frog
Ogid New: Flytrap, Mom
Phaze: Hobo, Twitch Con Attendee
Thatcher: Reverse Ostrich Rider, Yellow Canary

Quest Pack 2/3

To switch outfits:


- Go to the specified characters room on your ship
- Select the Switch Outfits options
- Click on Halloween

data.short_description: Save Halloween in this new quest pack! Complete with two new quests and two new outfit packs (each with a Halloween outfit for every party member)!
